message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this amazing product. I think you'll find it's worth every penny. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1100000. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $950000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. However, I'm afraid I need to make a profit on this deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go as low as $1050000. That's the lowest I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $980000?

I'm glad we're close, Bob. I can see you're really interested in this product. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell it to you for $990000. That's as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $975000?

I think we're getting close, Bob. I can see you're really serious about this product. I'm willing to make one last concession. I'll sell it to you for $985000. That's my final offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your efforts to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $975000?
